Investors Want Proof That Digital Ads Aren’t Funding Misinformationklundster0/21/2021

Check My Ads' Claire Atkin spoke with Adweek about how activist investors could change ideas of brand safety.

Programmatic, Ad TechRead

Programmatic Awards & Honors Ad Tech CES Data & Insights DMEXCO Emerging Tech The Future of Identity Lead Generation NexTech

Programmatic

Programmatic Awards & Honors Ad Tech CES Data & Insights DMEXCO Emerging Tech The Future of Identity Lead Generation NexTech

Ad Tech

Check My Ads co-founder Claire Atkin is 'optimistic' that recent demands could spell change

By Kathryn Lundstrom

January 21, 2021

Following this summers racial justice reckoning, coupled with research showing younger consumers are supporting brands that share their views, a new kind of sheriff has emerged in the Wild West of online media: the activist investor.

Kathryn Lundstrom

  • @klundster
  • kathryn.lundstrom@adweek.com

Kathryn Lundstrom is Adweek's sustainability editor.
